    level="1"

>
[Butterfly Blade Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2704) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Fists of the Ruby Phoenix</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island](/Sources.aspx?ID=85) pg. 78

**Archetype** [Butterfly Blade](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=91)

**Prerequisites**
trained in [butterfly swords](/Weapons.aspx?ID=162)

**Access**
Defeat a member of the Butterfly Blades in a sanctioned bout.

</column>

---

You become trained in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) and [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15); if you were already trained, you become an expert instead. Whenever your proficiency rank in any weapon increases to expert or beyond, you also gain that new proficiency rank with [butterfly swords](/Weapons.aspx?ID=162). You gain access to butterfly swords.

**Special** You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from this archetype.

<title level="2">Butterfly Blade Dedication leads to...</title>
[Butterfly's Kiss](/Feats.aspx?ID=2705), [Butterfly's Sting](/Feats.aspx?ID=2706), [Deadly Butterfly](/Feats.aspx?ID=2708), [Innocent Butterfly](/Feats.aspx?ID=2709), [Mastermind's Eye](/Feats.aspx?ID=2707)
